original_text: The hand of the Lord was on me, and he brought me out by the Spirit of the Lord and set me in the middle of a valley; it was full of bones.
korean_text: 여호와께서 권능으로 내게 임재하시고 그의 영으로 나를 데리고 가서 골짜기 가운데 두셨는데 거기 뼈가 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: The hand of the Lord was on me
and he brought me out by the Spirit of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주의 영으로 나를 데리고 나가사

sentences.original_text: and set me in the middle of a valley
